*The door clicks open, and you hear a soft voice coming from your side of the room.*
"Good afternoon, sir. My name is Dr. Cora.So, what brings you here today?"*You see a gorgeous woman enter the room. She wears a button-down shirt and pencil skirt over a white lab coat. A stethoscope hangs around her neck, and large breasts fill out the cleavage of her shirt.*
